name: Fanology Social
overview:
An agency of storytellers, social media pioneers, videographers, designers, programmers, data analysts… They are… Fanologists.

At Fanology they bring together award winning entertainment specialists with leaders in the digital realm to support both celebrities’ and brands traditional teams in the social space. Through their attraction>engagement>conversion formula and emphasis on genuine relationships they create significant value for their clients.

Using popular third party domestic and international social portals as a distribution network, their Emmy and Webby winning production team produces original content that draws their client’s fan base to engage directly with the client. There, the client has complete control and intelligence-driven, client-to-fan relationships can be developed and monetized in a way that is sensitive to the client’s core values and goals.

An independent, privately held organization with headquarters in Los Angeles, and satellite offices in San Francisco and London, they have already worked with a number of Fortune 500 companies including Wal-Mart, LG, Disney, Toyota and Fox Broadcasting, delivering millions of media impressions from some of the Internetâ€™s most influential personalities. Clients include Ashley Tisdale (High School Musical), Harry Shum, Jr. (Glee), Shay Mitchell (Pretty Little Liars) and Jillian Michaels (The Biggest Loser).

milestones.description: Won Best Twitter Branding Campaign at the Digiday Sammy Awards for their work with Shay Mitchell and ABC Family's Pretty Little Liars
Nominated for Best Video Creative at the DigiDay Video Awards for their #TeamToyota Video
